title: BTBox2021
author: BTBox2021
content: The mobile mine box produced by our company, BTBOX-MC40HC, complies with the UL standard of the United States and is urgently needed for sale. If you intend to become the agent of the company, you are welcome to join usã€‚Telegram:@BTBox2021

comments.author: SFR10
comments.body: I'm going to use this thread to respond to your other thread [not sure why you chose the "Development & Technical Discussion" board, but it has nothing to do with it (you could've just asked your question here)]:Quote from: BTBox2021 on December 28, 2022, 08:39:18 AMMy company has a mobile mine box and wants to sell it to the United States. How can I find a better channel?I don't know if there's a dedicated channel for the US, but you can also try creating a thread in the following subreddit: r/BitcoinMining
